title: Indian Summers: Episode 3 Preview Masterpiece
text: In the third episode of Indian Summers: The annual fair brings familiar faces, and new trouble. Indian Summers, Episode 3 airs Sunday, October 11 at 9/8c on MASTERPIECE on PBS. #IndianSummersPBS
